title: MCredd - package creation steps
text: Create Github repository. Create R project Github (See https://happygitwithr.com/ linking Github repos Rstudio). usethis::create_package("PATH/MCredd") PATH path project folder set project creation. usethis::use_pkgdown() usethis::use_vignette("app-generation", "MCredd - package creation steps")

title: Authors and Citation
text: Last F (2024). MCredd: Package (One Line, Title Case). R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://r-mcredd.github.io/MCredd/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {MCredd: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)},   author = {First Last},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://r-mcredd.github.io/MCredd/}, }

what: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: MonteCarlo simulations estimating uncertainty REDD+ greenhouse gas emissions removals forest changes.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: Input Monte Carlo model input variables characteristics (raw data aggregation factors, see v2.0 roadmap) Chose number repetitions Choose add custom formulas input variables. Run Simulations app simulate desired number repetitions calculate uncertainty calculated variables.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: input_category / input_name / input_error_type / input_distribution / fixed_value / normal_mu / normal_sigma / others

what: Option 1: Input a list of variables and their distribution characteristics:
